page.title: 06Unemployment in Thurcroft
page.content: When we did our Employment Survey during July,1985,we asked questions concerning unemployment.South Yorkshire is an area of high unemployment and we wanted to see how Thurcroft fitted into the pattern. Among our sample we found that 23% were unemployed.The figure for the Rotherham area is 19% and the figure for the whole of South Yorkshire is 22%.The difference between our figure and the Rotherham figure is probably due to our sample.Thurcroft seems to be typical of most of South Yorkshire. We also asked about length of unemployment.In our sample 40% had been unemployed for less than 1 year, 33% for between 1 and 3 years and 27% for longer than 3 years.Because the sample of unemployed was fairly small these figures may not give us an accurate picture.
